item.title: Staying Private
item.description: The less you share, the less people will interfere. It’s easier to deal with your drama when it’s private. You will stop caring about other’s opinion of you. Your safety will be less compromised. It allows you to focus on important people - “You”. It helps you connect with people on a deeper level.

item.title: Zimbro CVE-2022-27925
item.description: Privilege Escalation Vector A. PwnKit Vulnerability Successful exploitation of this vulnerability allows anu unprivileged user to gain root privileges on the target.

item.title: Clearing Info Windows Commands
item.description: A. Running command prompt with Administrator C:\WINDOWS\system32>ipconfig /flushdns B. Clearing Host Browser Cache in Chrome Browser window: chrome://net-internals/#dns Click on “Clear host cache” next to Host resolver cache C.

item.title: Mac iOS Commands
item.description: Open Spotlight Search - command key + spacebar Say command - ❯ say hello world Show wifi passwords - ❯ security find-generic-password -wa wifiname > password Show wifi passwords + copy ❯ security find-generic-password -wa wifiname | pbcopy (copy and share) After running use command to paste save or email - command + v command+option+shift+v - will paste with out formatting (plain text) command+v - will paste to share Type - caffeinate – prevent the system from sleeping on behalf of a utility Screen Capture - command+shift+3 - whole screen Screen Capture - command+shift_4 - selected area Screen Capture - command+control+shift+4 - copies to clipboard Screen Capture Name File - defaults write com.
